**FAQ's**
 
 *Why do you block email ports on these plans?* -- **This is to prevent email marketing/spammers from utilizing our services. If you are a developer there are many free email delivery services such as [mandrill](http://mandrill.com/) that you can utilize on these plans even with SMTP blocked.**
 
 *Can I use my own windows license I swear I have a real one!* -- **Nope, we no longer allow customers to use their own custom windows licenses.**
 
 *I have a custom iso file can I use it?* -- **Depends on the ISO, but typically yes. We utilize KVM virtulaization and can boot to ISO's. If the iso does not come from a reputable source we'll likely deny your request.**
